sentences: Ta lahkus pärast tööd kohe koju.
Meie lahkumine oli ootamatu ja valuline.
Lahkudes andis ta mulle viimase pilgu.
context: The word 'lahkud' in Estonian refers to the act of leaving a place, person, or situation. It can also imply a farewell or parting. In English, it is commonly used when someone is going away, either temporarily or permanently.
